items.title: Hi, I'm Paul Jacobson an Engineer
items.description: Hello § If you are reading this you probably have scanned my business card. Here are some useful links. About Me § LinkedIn § Resume § Github § Portfolio § Contact Me § Thanks § Thanks for checking out my site! I hope to hear from you soon.

items.title: About Me
items.description: Hello! I’m a resourceful engineer with a solid foundation in both mechanical and computer engineering, shaped by my Engineering Physics major and Computer Science minor.

items.title: Portfolio
items.description: Additive Manufacturing § FPV Drones § NozeWipe § 3D printer nozzle wiper for Voron printers. Scribble~Starter § Senor design project a per-writing skill tool.

items.title: Additive Manufacturing
items.description: Additive Manufacturing § I’ve spent the past 8 years working with 3D printing, starting with a Sidewinder X1 and eventually moving on and building a Voron 2.

items.title: FPV Drones
items.description: An Quick Explanation of FPV Drones. § An FPV (First Person View) drone consists of several key components including the carbon fiber frame provides the structure.

items.title: Scribble~Starter
items.description: About § The Scribble~Starter is a pen that lights up and plays sound when writing or drawing on a planner surface. The motivation is to make a tool for promoting writing skills in young kids with or without developmental delays.

items.title: NozeWipe
items.description: About § A Voron 3D printer mod for cleaning the nozzle of the printer. It was designed to be simple and adjustable, providing a suitable nozzle cleaner.
